Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student might attempt to draw two figures that could represent students, but these figures may be simplistic or basic stick figures.
The student might draw a single cup or irregular shapes that could be interpreted as cups (attempting to show the materials but without clear function or connection).
CANNOT: The student is unlikely to connect the cups with a string correctly or at all (may draw a line next to students but not connecting them).
The student does not label or explain how sound travels through the string (lacks understanding of sound transmission).
The student might include unrelated or incorrect elements in their drawing that do not pertain to a string telephone (misunderstanding of task).
The student is unlikely to include any scenario or setting that illustrates communication over distance (may not grasp the broader concept of distance communication).
